section.heading: Requirement.
section.text: Each determination required by the State Finance and Procurement Article, Division II, Annotated Code of Maryland, or by this title shall be:

para.text: Based on written findings of, and signed by, the person who made the determination; and
Retained in the appropriate procurement file for at least 3 years.

section.heading: Electronic Records.
section.text: The requirements of Regulation .01 of this chapter may be satisfied by electronic records and signatures.
